title: black screen - was low, plugged in - later black screen, tried pushing power button - saw Google,
content: plugged in to chg battery, took nap, woke up should have been full, disconnected and tried to open - just black, pushed power button, saw 'GOOGLE', nothing else happened no matter what I pushed and "GOOGLE" disappeared. Brand new phone. Probably simple - just don't know what to do.
